projects.title: App Trible
projects.description: The Trible application is for displaying and sale of Mobile phones and electronic devices  through which you can choose The right product for you while knowing all the data related towith this product, knowing the seller, and communicating with him directly through the application

projects.title: App Osool
projects.description: The Osool application is an application for displaying the sale of real estate through which you can choose the appropriate properties for you while knowing all the data related to these properties, knowing the owner, and communicating with him directly through the application

projects.title: App Banknot

projects.title: Admin Control
projects.description: Admin pages are very important and are essential for managing websites and applications and controlling the entire site or application because they are one of the pillars of the project for adding or deleting a product and knowing customers and interacting with them.
